xmlText.p: CLEVELAND INDIANS — Agreed to terms with OF Rajai Davis on a minor league contract.
MINNESOTA TWINS — Agreed to terms with OF Chris Heisey on a minor league contract.
SEATTLE MARINERS — Agreed to terms with OF Junior Lake on a minor league contract.<
TAMPA BAY RAYS — Acquired 1B C.J. Cron from the Los Angeles Angels for a player to be named. Designated OF Corey Dickerson for assignment.
SAN DIEGO PADRES — Claimed RHP Rowan Wick off waivers from St. Louis.<
CALGARY FLAMES — Placed LW Marek Hrivik on injured reserve. Recalled F Morgan Klimchuk form Stockton (AHL).
CAROLINA HURRICANES — Reassigned F Patrick Brown to Charlotte (AHL).
COLORADO AVALANCHE — Reassigned F A.J. Greer to San Antonio (AHL).
NEW JERSEY DEVILS — Recalled LW Blake Pietila from Binghamton (AHL).<
AHL — Suspended Hershey F Riley Barber one game.<
HARTFORD WOLF PACK — Signed G Drew Fielding to a professional tryout agreement.<
ECHL — Suspended RW Bryan Moore and Idaho C Jefferson Dahl one game.<
ST. JOHN'S — Announced sophomore men's basketball G Marcus LoVett is leaving school.
SOUTH CAROLINA — Announced junior G Kory Holden has left the men's basketball team.
